title: Will I get a subsidy for my education loan as per the 'Central Sector Scheme of Interest Subsidy on Education Loan' if I have taken a loan in 2014? - Quora

response.answer_text: No, you are not eligible to get a subsidy under this scheme. As per the policy guidelines, only those students who availed an education loan before 2009 will get an interest subsidy on the basis of this scheme.  According to this scheme, the government will to pay the outstanding interest liability for the period till December 31, 2013, but the borrower has to pay interest for the period after January 2014. In case you want to check out the various education loan options available in India, do read -> Education Loan: Apply Online in India, Interest Rates
